charges.charge_disposition: On motion of USA Ct 1 is Dismissed

Defendant is committed to custody of BOP to be imprisoned for a total term of LIFE; that defendant, as to Ct II is committed to custody of BOP for a term of 120 months; furnter that as to Ct III, defendant is committed to custody of BOP for a term of Life with said term to run concurrently with the sentence imposed on the Ct II offense; S/R of 10 years; SMA $200.00
